maqras.text: gajang wie gyesineun junim-ui ileum-eul chanmihala
geubun-eun ingan-eul changjohasa gajang-aleumdaun hyeongsang-eulo jieusyeoss-eumyeo
modeun geos-e teugjing-eul dusa geugeos eulo yuyongke hayeoss-eumyeo
geubun-eun mogcholeul saengseongke hasigo
geugeos-eul galsaeg-ui maleun pullo ha sidoda
hananim-i geudaeege malsseum-eul gyesihani amgihayeo ij-ji malla
geuleona hananim-i wonhaneun geos-eunje-oela sillo geubun-eun issneun geosgwa sumgyeojin modeun geos-eul algo gyesinila
hananim-eun geugeos-i geudaeege swibdolog hayeo jueoss-euni
geu gyohun-eul jeondalhayeo deudneun ja deul-ege yuighadolog hala
hananim-eul dulyeowo haneun jadeul eun geu gyohun-eul bad-adeul-il geos-imyeo
bulhaenghan bulsinjadeul-eun geugeos-eul hoepihani
keun buljiog-eulo deul-eoga
geugos-eseo jugjido anihago saljido moshalila
geuleona seuseuloleul cheong-gyeolke han ja beonseonghalini
junim-ui ileum-eul chanmihago gi dohala
geulaedo neohuiga hyeonse-ui salm-eul joh-ahana
naesega deo joh-eumyeo yeong-wonhani la
sillo igeos-eun yes seongseoedo gye sidoeeo iss-eumyeo
abeulahamgwa mose-ui seongseoedogeuleohanila
jeohanghal su eobsneun jaeang-ui sosig-i geudaeege ileuleossneunyo
geunal gul-yog-eul masbol eolguldeul-i issnani
simhan nodong-eulo jichin sangtaeeseo
geudeul-i buljieug-eulo deul-eogani
kkeulhgo issneun hwayeom-ui mul-eul masi ge doedoda
mojin gasi oeeneun geudeul-eul wi han eumsigdo eobs-euni
yeong-yang-i eobs-eo gulmjulim-e mu-ighalppun-ila
geuleona geunal gippeum-eul mankkighal eolguldeul-i issnani
geudeul-eun geudeul-ui nolyeog-eulo gippeohamyeo
nop-i issneun cheongug-eulo deul-eogamae
geudeul-eun mu-ighan malhanmadi deud ji anihamyeo
geugos-eneun heuleuneun saemmul-i issgo
nop-eun gos-e issneun anlag uija-e anj-euni
imi junbidoen jandeul-i issnola
anlaghan begaedeul-i juljieo issgo
hwalyeohan yungdan-i pyeolchyeojyeo issnola
nagtaga eotteohge changjodoeeossneunji geudeul-eun suggohaji anhneunyo
haneul-eun eotteohge nop-i ollyeojyeoss eumyeo
sandeul-eun eotteohge gojeongdoeeossgo
daejineun eotteohge pyeolchyeojyeossneungaleul suggohaji anhneunyo
gyeong-gohala sillo geudaeneun gyeong-go jail ppun-eulo
ingan-eul gamdoghamyeo gang-yohaneun jaga anila
geuleona oemyeonhago hananim-eul bulsinhan ja issdamyeon
hananimkkeseo geuege keun beol-eulnaelisil geos-iyo
geudeul-i hananim-ege dol-aohani
geudeul-eul bulleo gyesanhalila
saebyeog-ui yeomyeong-gileul dugo maengsehasa
yeolheul dong-an-ui bam-eul dugo maengse hamyeo
jjagsuwa holsuleul dugo maengsehamyeo
salajineun bam-eul dugo maengsehani
sillo geu an-eneun ihaehaneun ja deul-eul wihan yejeung-i issnola
junimkkeseo adeu baegseong-e haenghan iyagiwa
nop-eun bilding-eul soyuhan ilam-ui baegseong-e gwanhan yaegileul aneunyo
geuwa gat-eun himsen baegseong-i daeji wieseo changjodoen jeog-i eobs-eossnola
san-ui bawilo gyegog-e jib-eul se un samudeu baegseong-ui iyagiwa
ganghan gundaeleul gajin omanhan palaoui iyagileul aneunyo
sillo ideul moduneun do-eub-eseo joeag-eul nahgo
geugos-eseo haeag-eul deohaeman gass euni
junimkkeseo geudeul wie yeoleoga jiui eungbeol-eul naelyeossnola
sillo geudae junim-eun hangsang gamsihago gyesinila
junimkkeseo ingan-eul siheomsam-a myeong-yewa eunhyeleul bepulmyeon igeos-eun ju kkeseo naege yeong-gwang-eul jusieossnola ha deola
geubunkkeseo il-yonghal yangsig-eul gam sohasil ttaemyeon jukkeseo naleul cheolyangha ge mandeusidoda malhago iss-euna
geuleohji aniham-ila neohuineun goadeul-ege eunhyeleul bepulji anihaess-eumyeo
gananhan jadeul-ege eumsig-eul jegongham-e seologa seolo-ege gyeoglyeohajianihamyeo
ohilyeo neohuineun yogsim-eul naeeogeudeul-ui yusan-eul samkigo
omanhage jaemulman-eul salanghayeossnola
geuleona daejiga sansanjogag-i doego
junim-i imhasigo geubun-ui cheon sadeul-i juljieo na-eul ttae
geunal-eun jiog-i natananila geunal ingan-eun geuui eobjeog-eul sang-giha na geuui hoegoga eotteohge geuleul yu ighage hagessneunyo
geuttaeya ingan-eun nae milaeui saeng-eul wihayeo seonhaeng-eul xCgeoya xCgneunde lago hantanhayeo malhana
geunal-eun eoneu nugudo gahal sueobsneun hananim-ui eungbeolman-i iss-eul geos ila
eoneu nugudo hal su eobsneun geu bun-ui sogbag-i iss-eulila
uiloun yeonghondeul-egeneun yeonghondeul a neohuineun wanjeonhan hyusiggwa gippeumsog e iss-eulila laneun malsseumgwa
gippeohago jeulgeowohamyeo junimkke lo dol-aga
nawa hamkke haneun jadeul gaundedeul-eowa
naui cheongug-eulo deullaneun malsseum i iss-eul geos-ila
